tool_description: Filters books by author names, supporting partial matches and multiple author criteria.

book_ids.description: Array of book IDs to filter

author_names.description: Array of author names to search for

match_type.description: Matching type: exact, partial, or fuzzy

error_messages: Empty book_ids array: Provide at least one book ID to filter.
Empty author_names array: Provide at least one author name for filtering.
Invalid match_type: Use one of [exact, partial, fuzzy].
Author not found: None of the specified authors were found in the book list.
usage: Provide book_ids and author_names arrays. Use match_type to control how strictly author names are matched - exact requires perfect matches, partial allows substring matches, fuzzy handles typos and variations.

filtered_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs that match the author criteria

matched_authors.description: Array of author names that were found and matched

books_remaining.description: Number of books that passed the author filter
